actions.name: Use the obtained source code without modification
actions.description: Use the fetched code as it is.

actions.name: Use the retrieved binaries
actions.description: Use the fetched binary as it is.

actions.name: Use binaries generated from modified source code

permissions._str:
Actions:
- Use the obtained source code without modification (Use the fetched code as it is.)
- Using Modified Source Code
- Use the retrieved binaries (Use the fetched binary as it is.)
- Use binaries generated from modified source code

Conditions: None

actions.name: Distribute the obtained source code without modification
actions.description: Redistribute the code as it was obtained

permissions._str:
Actions:
- Distribute the obtained source code without modification (Redistribute the code as it was obtained)

Conditions:
OBLIGATION: Include a copyright notice, list of terms and conditions, and disclaimer included in the license

conditions.name: Include a copyright notice, list of terms and conditions, and disclaimer included in the license

actions.name: Distribute the fetched binaries
actions.description: Redistribute the fetched binaries as they are

permissions._str:
Actions:
- Distribute the fetched binaries (Redistribute the fetched binaries as they are)

Conditions:
OBLIGATION: Include a copyright notice, list of terms and conditions, and disclaimer in the materials accompanying the distribution, which are included in the license

conditions.name: Include a copyright notice, list of terms and conditions, and disclaimer in the materials accompanying the distribution, which are included in the license

actions.name: Use the copyright holder's name to endorse or promote the derived product

permissions._str:
Description: With permission of the copyright owner.
Actions:
- Use the copyright holder's name to endorse or promote the derived product

Conditions:
REQUISITE: Get special permission in writing.
permissions.description: With permission of the copyright owner.

permissions._str:
Actions:
- Modify the obtained source code.

Conditions:
OBLIGATION: Indicate your changes and the date of your changes in the file where you made them.

conditions.name: Indicate your changes and the date of your changes in the file where you made them.

permissions._str:
Actions:
- Distribution of Modified Source Code

Conditions:
AND
  OBLIGATION: Include a copyright notice, list of terms and conditions, and disclaimer included in the license
  OBLIGATION: Indicate your changes and the date of your changes in the file where you made them.

AND.name: Include a copyright notice, list of terms and conditions, and disclaimer included in the license
Indicate your changes and the date of your changes in the file where you made them.

actions.name: Distribute the generated binaries from modified source code

permissions._str:
Actions:
- Distribute the generated binaries from modified source code

Conditions:
AND
  OBLIGATION: Include a copyright notice, list of terms and conditions, and disclaimer in the materials accompanying the distribution, which are included in the license
  OBLIGATION: Indicate your changes and the date of your changes in the file where you made them.

AND.name: Include a copyright notice, list of terms and conditions, and disclaimer in the materials accompanying the distribution, which are included in the license
